pageContent.descriptionText: <Introtext style="font-family:Helvetica; font-size:16pt; font-weight:bold; color:#cc0033; margin:10px; padding:0 0 0 5px; background:#e8e8e8; border-bottom:1px solid #333; display:block;">Spot On</Introtext><welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:12pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:normal; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">Good job. Since this is a new prescribing cycle at Sunnydale Psychiatry, you should step back and create your Value Map based on your current knowledge. It's important that you check to make sure you have identified any other needs the customer may have. This allows you to take action to get your customer what they might be lacking to move to the next phase.</welcomeText>
